abstract: Patrick Long, the American Le Mans Series driver, and his brother, the professional skateboarder Kevin Long, are a mutual admiration society.
snippet: Patrick Long, the American Le Mans Series driver, and his brother, the professional skateboarder Kevin Long, are a mutual admiration society.
lead_paragraph: Patrick Long, the American Le Mans Series GT2 driver, and his younger brother Kevin Long, a professional skateboarder, are elite competitors in their respective wheeled pursuits.

headline.main: For the Long Brothers, a Shared Passion for Wheeled Speed
